rules_text:
Blockbuster 2 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap two untapped permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If this spell is a blockbuster, put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.
flavor_text: [i]Fate brought them together, to fight for something right.[/i]
